response: If you are seeing an `Invalid Session` error when trying to log into a server, try relogging into your Minecraft launcher. This issue is entirely on Mojang's side.
If you are trying to reinstall a mod because of it's erroring, **don't**. It has never helped and will never help.

The old launcher can be installed from here:
<https://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msi>
